Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Relates to establishing the private employers veterans' preference policy act
Summary: Permits private employers to adopt a veterans' hiring preference policy.
LawCode: Add ยง36, Veterans' Services L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the veterans' services law, in relation to permitting private employers to adopt a veterans' preference employment policy
